channel.title: SevenAtSevenSection1
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenSection1, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The hidden costs of cutting Medicaid
item.description: Cutting Medicaid can seem like an easy way to slash the budget. But, the costs can spread to all of us.

item.title: Alaska was once a full-fledged Russian colony. Now it's hosting a U.S.-Russia summit

item.title: Why lung cancer is a 'hidden epidemic' in this part of the world
item.description: Rates of the world's deadliest cancer appear to be low in sub-Saharan Africa. But that statistic is masking the scope of the disease, doctors say.

item.description: Google will let you define the top sources to get more stories from those sites.

item.title: How a once-tiny research lab helped Nvidia become a $4 trillion-dollar company
item.description: Nvidia's research lab developed the technology that took the company from a video game GPU startup to a $4 trillion-dollar company.

item.title: Video shows steel workers scrambling into wreckage left by explosion that killed 2 in Pennsylvania
item.description: After an explosion rocked a steel plant outside Pittsburgh, workers scrambled into the wreckage alongside firefighters directing streams of water.

item.title: TDK backs Ultraviolette with $21M to take India-made electric motorcycles global
item.description: Ultraviolette aims to expand its electric motorcycles to 40 European countries, as well as Latin America and Southeast Asia.
